item.description:
SEE THE FLYER HERE

Our Electronics Recycling Fundraiser is coming up Saturday, April 14th from 9am to 1pm, we will have Metech Recycling set up at the UU Church taking and green recycling all your old electronics. They take nearly everything, and take care of it in an environmentally responsible manner.

Pricing for green recycling ( few samples - prices are based on weight, so this gives an idea of what to expect):
$10: Laptop, VCR, Shoe Box of Cords or Data Storage
$15: Microwave, Desktop Computer, Monitors, Typewriters
$20: Fax Machine, Stereo System
$25: Televisions over 21-32" | Televisions 32" and up: $1 per inch
diagonally

They take LOTS more, and if you have any questions about pricing, we're happy to answer. Please help support GWH through this fundraiser, and if you'd like to volunteer, we'd be happy to have you!
item.name: Electronics Recycling Fundraiser
